categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Master Stroke was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer in the Imperial Starfleet.

The Master Stroke remained in Imperial service until at least 13 ABY, when it participated in the Battle of Adumar after the planet joined the New Republic. In that battle, the Master Stroke suffered serious damage at the hands of the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Allegiance and Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Mon Casima.
